1.0.1.name: wordpress/shopp-mobile-notifications
1.0.1.description:
This plugin adds text message notifications for new orders.

After checkout, the merchant will receive a text message with new order information. This process occurs in the background without needing action from the user.

Recommendations

  • Learn about our latest Shopp project: Shopp 101 -- Online lessons and video tutorials for Shopp ecommerce plugin
  • Need help with your Shopp ecommerce store? Hire a Shopp developer today.
  • View additional WordPress plugins for Shopp by Lorenzo Orlando Caum, Enzo12 LLC
  • Follow Lorenzo on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn
